newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia 1st half 97 car sales 142,193 units.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia 1st half 97 car sales 142,193 units.

text.p: Malaysia's passenger car sales totalled 142,193 units from January to June 1997 against 118,552 in the corresponding 1996 period, the Malaysian Motor Traders Assocation (MMTA) said on Thursday.
Commercial vehicle sales during the period totalled 37,798 units versus 29,485 in the comparable 1996 period.
Sales of four-wheel drive commercial and passenger vehicles in the first six months totalled 12,527 units against 8,825 in the corresponding period last year.
In June 1997, passenger car sales totalled 24,935 units against 23,266 in the year-ago period, commercial vehicle sales were 6,979 against 6,394, and four-wheel drives 2,353 against 2,280.
